titleStmt.title: The fundamental truths of Christianity briefly hinted at by way of question and answer : to which is added a treatise of prayer in the same method / by George Keith.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. and separate paging ([10], 128 p.): Concerning prayer. [London] : 1687.
Preface signed by R.B. [i.e. Robert Barclay] cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
